title: Anyone else experiencing this bug?
body:
I am experiencing a chat bug and have already submitted a report. but wanted to know if anyone else was experiencing it, and if not, is it something that can be fixed on my end? This is happening more and more frequently. 

When I am in game and I try to ping anything, like an enemy's summoner spell after it was used, it turns into a blank line or a time stamp with my name. I am also missing messages from my teammates as well (confirmed with a duo to compare our chats). Anything I ping like an item, a spell, or a portrait is affected. 

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: There might be some game files not loading your assets properly.  Try a force repatch through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if that helps.  Otherwise, our tech team should be able to dig in deeper since you have a ticket up.  I hope that helps!
